name: GLKTextureEnvMode
desc: The mode used to combine the texture with other color components.

items.name: case replace
items.desc: The output color is set to the color fetched from the texture. The input color is ignored.

items.name: case modulate
items.desc: The output color is calculated by multiplying the texture’s color by the input color.

items.name: case decal
items.desc: The output color is calculated by using the texture’s alpha component to blend the texture’s color with the input color.
